text: Adidja Azim Palmer (born 7 January 1976) better known as Vybz Kartel, is a Jamaican dancehall musician. Kartel started a line of liquor in 2008. ==Career== Kartel has worked with Jay-Z, Rihanna, Missy Elliott, Busta Rhymes, M.I.A, Pharrell, Kardinal Offishall, Akon, Jim Jones, Lil Wayne and Eminem. ==Personal life== On 29 September 2011, Kartel was arrested. Jamaica's Major Investigation Taskforce (MIT) charged him with murder. Kartel was found guilty after a 65-day trial. He was sentenced to life imprisonment on 3 April 2014. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Jamaican singers Category:Living people Category:Murderers Category:Jamaican reggae musicians
title: Vybz Kartel
